item.title: About
item.description: I graduated from BGSU in 2018 with a non-computer science degree, but it didn’t take long to realize I wanted something more challenging. A friend introduced me to Tech Elevator, and it turned out to be the perfect fit. I completed their 3-month bootcamp and graduated in late 2020, right when remote roles were booming. My first professional developer job was at JPMC, though, truthfully, it wasn’t as coding-heavy as I hoped.

item.title: Grokking Rails
item.description: Notify myself and other users who sign up when they can act upon free non-gambling related game-day promotions.
